title: Colour and surface functional properties of wool fabrics coated with gallnut, feijoa skin, and mango seed kernel tannin-stabilised Ag nanoparticles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9678-9690
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00367E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mohammad Mahbubul Hassan, Tanushree Gupta
In this work, synthesis of Ag nanoparticles, and colouration and multifunctionalisation of wool fabric were carried out in a single bath using tannins extracted from various biomasses as a reducing agent and as a stabiliser.
